alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Echols, central Ware, central Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Homerville to 12 miles southeast of Argyle to near Fargo. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Argyle, Stephen Foster State Park, Needmore and Manor. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
